Now True Key will instantly log you in to popular apps, and to your favorite websites on Chrome.
This is your True Key instant log in Overlay. \nYou can drag it wherever you want on the screen.

*NEXT STEPS*
To enable True Key instant log in, tap on the switch button in the top right corner.

A pop-up screen will appear and outline the accessibility details required to use this feature, click 'OK' to proceed.

After completing the above steps, you can hit the back button twice to return to True Key .

---------

When the True Key instant log in Accessibility Service is enabled, your device will show the True Key overlay on top of your favorite apps and websites, allowing you to seamlessly login.

----------

Optionally, if you would prefer True Key not to appear on a specific app, you can tap on the X and select 'Forever'.

If you want to revert 'Forever' dismissing the overlay on a specific app, proceed to the True Key settings and select 'Dismissed instant log in Apps'.

After how much time of inactivity would you like your True Key Profile to lock?

Hey,

I just started using True Key and thought you might like it. It\'s a great way to manage your online accounts so that you won\'t have to remember a password again.

Check it out: %2$s

What We Believe

The True Key team believes that people spend far too much time and energy trying to remember all of their usernames and passwords. To save time and provide peace of mind, we built a free service to store, retrieve and share passwords anytime, anywhere, on any device. We also believe that everyone should have greater control over their digital property - during life and after. This is why True Key is the first and only password manager in the world that allows users to pass on their important passwords to the people they trust.

Who We Are

True Key was founded by Daniel Robichaud and Marc-Antoine Ross, two successful entrepreneurs tired of losing time keeping track of passwords across their computers, phones and iPads. Today, hundreds of thousands of users around the world choose True Key to keep their passwords on hand, share them with co-workers and family members, and pass them on to people they trust. We\'re always looking for more passionate people to work with, so if you share our passion and are interested in helping people easily preserve their digital life, please contact us.
Download True Key on your computer to have instant access across all devices. Once you\'ve installed, you\'ll receive your free password reward!
Save a password to True Key and it is instantly saved to all your browsers, computers and mobiles devices.
Store unlimited passwords by inviting your friends to join True Key.
If you get 5 people to join and install True Key you will receive your Free Premium Subscription.

Instantly log in using your unique facial features..
Can I edit/change my saved passwords?
Yes! press on the login you\'d like to change, and a pop-up menu will appear. Tap \'Edit/View Password\'. Enter your updated information, and click \'Save\' to confirm the change.

True Key is a security product everyone can use. Your data is encrypted with AES-256, the strongest grade of encryption available. And you can boost your True Key by adding additional attributes, or \'factors\' - like your fingerprint. Plus, you\'re in good hands with Intel Security, True Key will never share or sell your data, keeping you in control of your personal information - just like it should be.
What happens if I forget my Master Password?

Your Master Password unlocks your True Key Profile, in addition to other factors that are unique to you. We won’t remember this one, so make sure you do. If you have forgotten your Master Password, please contact True Key support.
I want to delete/close my True Key Profile.

To close your true Key Profile, please contact True Key support. In the interest of serving future users better, we’d really appreciate your feedback, so please include your comments on our service when sending your request.
How do I use instant log in to 3rd party apps?

Please enable this feature in the in-app Settings menu. Once enabled, a True Key icon will appear on your keyboard. When you\'re on a login page for an app or website, tap the icon and your username and password will be filled in automatically. We\'ll even click the \'Login\' button for you.
Where can I use True Key Face Unlock and on which platforms?

You can download True Key on all popular devices, however, Face Unlock is currently only available on Windows 8, 8.1, Internet Explorer 10 + 11 and Google Chrome browsers. We will be releasing more platforms and ways to authenticate in the months to come.
How are you sure it\’s me logging in?

You’re in good hands with Intel Security. True Key uses very sophisticated algorithms to confirm it\’s you, including, your facial math, your fingerprint on iOS and Android mobile devices, and other attributes that you set up and are unique to you.

You, your data and True Key
What information does the True Key app collect?
How do I disable Face Unlock from my device?
How can I delete my facial math from Intel Security\'s data centers?
Will my True Key app keep track of the websites I access?
Will the True Key service use my information for any other purpose?
Where can I get more information about the True Key app?
Intel Security respects your privacy. Please read our Privacy Notice for more information on how Intel Security manages any personal information.

True Key would like to collect some non-personal data about your device and how True Key is used. This data will be used to improve current and future products. If you do not wish this data to be collected, you can turn this collections off. This will not affect the functionality of True Key. For more information on the type of data collected, click here.
Your encrypted True Key data is stored on a secure True Key server. The only way this information is accessed is with factors that are unique to you – including your facial math or Master Password.
You can disable Face Unlock on your device in the Lock Preferences section.
To have your facial math deleted from an Intel Security data center, please contact customer support.
The True Key app may collect anonymous performance data of the auto-filling feature on some websites, to help improve our service.
No, the True Key service does not sell or share your information to a third party without your consent.
Please visit True Key, or contact customer support.
How do you want to lock your app?
Choose which security level you would like to use to unlock your True Key profile.
How to choose my security level
Allows you to login faster, recommended if your phone is locked most of the time and sensitive data is stored on the device.
Uses liveness detection and anti-spoofing technologies, might take some more time to log you in your app.
